## Ingredients

1 + 1/2 cup castor (or powdered) sugar 

3/4 cup a.p. flour

3/4 cup cooking oil

1/2 cup cocoa powder

1 + 1/2 tsp vanilla essence

3 eggs

1/4 + 1/8 tsp baking powder

1/4 tsp salt

## Directions

Mix sugar, oil, vanilla and eggs in a bowl.

In a seperate bowl mix cocoa powder, baking powder, salt and flour.

Add dry ingredients to wet and mix together.

Pour into a greased/lined pan. 

Bake for 20-25 mins in a 180Â°C preheated oven.
